verbs.description: [ARG0: Syria 's Assad regime] [V: launched] [ARG1: an alleged chemical weapons attack] [ARGM-TMP: late Saturday] , [ARGM-ADV: killing dozens] . It led Donald Trump to turn his attention to his predecessor .
Syria 's Assad regime launched an [V: alleged] [ARG1: chemical weapons attack] late Saturday , killing dozens . It led Donald Trump to turn his attention to his predecessor .
[ARG0: Syria 's Assad regime] launched an alleged chemical weapons attack late Saturday , [V: killing] [ARG1: dozens] . It led Donald Trump to turn his attention to his predecessor .
Syria 's Assad regime launched an alleged chemical weapons attack late Saturday , killing dozens . [ARG0: It] [V: led] [ARG1: Donald Trump] [ARG2: to turn his attention to his predecessor] .
Syria 's Assad regime launched an alleged chemical weapons attack late Saturday , killing dozens . It led [ARG0: Donald Trump] to [V: turn] [ARG1: his attention] [ARGM-DIR: to his predecessor] .
